Method.Name: jcolibri.extensions.DL.method.LoadDLCaseBaseMethod
Method.Description: Loads the Case Base from a DLs Reasoner

Method.Name: jcolibri.extensions.DL.method.ConfigureDLQueryMethod
Method.Description: Asks user for the DL query using the XML file generated by jCOLIBRI tools. It also configures similarity functions.

Parameter.Name: Case Structure
Parameter.Description: XML file generated by jCOLIBRI tools

Method.Name: jcolibri.extensions.DL.method.DLAdaptationMethod
Method.Description: Performs several adaptations defined by rules

Parameter.Name: Solution Attribute
Parameter.Description: Attribute of the solution that contains the concept type value that links with the instance to adapt
